pages.text: Oh, this cursed destiny! All I know is that after taking fatal damage, I will always wake up only with what I had equipped, but permanently damaged.$(br2)$(#158B1D)You keep your main-hand item, armor and baubles on death but they lose 5% durability.$()
If I go back to where I was, I may be able to pick up what I lost, but I'll have to face with a rotten reminder of my demise.
